module.p: Anthroponyms are names which identify individual persons and other personified entities like toys, boats, pet animals, etc.

Like other kinds of name, anthroponyms can be classified into two grammatical types –
anthroponymic proper nouns – Mairead
Margaret, Seumas (Beag) James (Junior)
anthroponymic name-descriptions – An Caiptean The Captain, Bean Alasdair Alexander’s Wife.
